message: I'm excited to show you this unique product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm thinking of a price of $25000 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but $25000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $18000. I can meet you halfway and offer it to you for $22000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $22000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $19500 for it.

I'm not willing to go as low as $19500, but I'm willing to compromise further. I can offer it to you for $21000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the fact that I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $21000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $19000 for it.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $20000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $20000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $18500 for it.

I've already met you at $20000 and then compromised further to $20000, and now you're asking me to go back to $18500? I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $20000 and $18500, which is $19250. This is my last offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $18000 for it.
